results.title: Pleiotropic effects of Salacia reticulata and Simvastatin on oxidative stress and insulin resistance in a rat model.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: The present study confirms that SR/@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SVS@@@ may be a new and promising remedial approach because of its beneficial effects on the pathophysiological processes of @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@ and related @<m>DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolic disorders@@@.

results.title: Folate- and chitosan-functionalized lipid nanoparticles for co-delivery of pioglitazone and simvastatin to enhance hepatic cancer therapy: effects on IL-1beta, IL-6, BCL2/BAX gene expression, and GPX4, COX-2, and MMP-9 activities.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@Pioglitazone@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@PIO@@@) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@STAT@@@), originally used for @<m>DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolic disorders@@@, also modulate oncogenic pathways.

results.title: Pleiotropic effects of rimonabant and simvastatin on obesity associated multiple metabolic risk factors in rats.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVES: The present study was undertaken to investigate the effect of @CHEMICAL_Rimonabant @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077285 @@@rimonabant@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and their combination on @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@ associated @<m>DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolic disorder@@@ mediators in adult male @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Integration of Ca2+ signaling regulates the breast tumor cell response to simvastatin and doxorubicin.
results.text_hl: Signal transduction and functional studies revealed that both @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@doxorubicin@@@ trigger persistent cytosolic Ca2+ release, thereby stimulating the proapoptotic @GENE_BCL2L11 @GENE_10018 @@@BIM@@@ pathway and mitochondrial Ca2+ overload, which are responsible for @<m>DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolic dysfunction@@@ and apoptosis induction.

citations.NLM: Abdoul-Azize S, Buquet C, Li H, Picquenot JM, Vannier JP. Integration of Ca2+ signaling regulates the breast tumor cell response to simvastatin and doxorubicin. Oncogene. 2018 Sep;37(36):4979-4993. PMID: 29795329

results.title: Metabolic effects of various antidiabetic and hypolipidaemic agents on a high-fat diet and multiple low-dose streptozocin (MLDS) mouse model of diabetes.
results.text_hl: We have evaluated the effect of various antidiabetic and @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ lowering agents (@CHEMICAL_Fenofibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011345 @@@fenofibrate@@@, @CHEMICAL_Rosiglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077154 @@@rosiglitazone@@@, @CHEMICAL_glimepiride @CHEMICAL_MESH:C057619 @@@glimepiride@@@, @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@) on the @<m>DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolic abnormalities@@@ induced by combining a high-fat diet and multiple low-dose @CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@streptozocin@@@ (MLDS) in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.
